comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content: Good Day....As most of the dome appears to be in place, this photo was PROBABLY taken CIRCA 1863.....A statue was placed on the "top" on 2 December 1863....HOWEVER, the actual COMPLETION date is most likely, January 1866 when the last scaffolding was removed from the INSIDE ...photos of the completed building taken "outside" are most likely 1864 and later...Dave
